name: Joltik

evolution.description: Joltik can evolve into Galvantula at level 10 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 14 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Attaching Pokémon. They attach themselves to large-bodied Pokémon and absorb static electricity, which they store in an electric pouch.

abilities.name: Compound Eyes
abilities.description: This Pokémon gets an additional +1 to attack rolls.

abilities.name: Unnerve
abilities.description: Opponents in combat with this Pokémon cannot eat held berries.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.
